<ce:section-title>Synthesis of complexes <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>–<ce:bold>6</ce:bold>
</ce:section-title><ce:section-title>[Zn(HBTA)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(3-bpo)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>](H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O) (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">A mixture of H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>BTA (24.5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and 3-bpo (22.4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was dissolved in DMF/H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL, <ce:italic>v</ce:italic>/<ce:italic>v</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>=<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>1/1) under stirring, which was placed at the bottom of a straight glass tube. Then, a CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>OH solution (10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) of Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (29.7<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was carefully layered onto it. Upon evaporation of the solvents, colorless block crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained after ca. 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>week in 51% yield (26.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, based on H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>BTA). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">40</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">26</ce:inf>ZnN<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">11</ce:inf>Br<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>: C, 47.11; H, 2.57; N, 10.99. Found: C, 46.89; H, 2.71; N, 11.12%. IR (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3495bs, 1716m, 1623vs, 1549w, 1468m, 1366s, 1296s, 1239s, 1092m, 1044s, 813m, 772w, 726w, 688w, 648w, 536m.</ce:para><ce:section-title>[Cd(HBTA)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(3-bpo)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>](H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf> (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">The same synthetic method as that for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> was used except that Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O was replaced by Cd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (30.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), producing colorless block crystals of <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> after ca. 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>week in 50% yield (28.5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, based on H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>BTA). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">40</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">34</ce:inf>CdN<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">15</ce:inf>Br<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>: C, 42.18; H, 3.01; N, 9.84. Found: C, 41.89; H, 3.34; N, 10.01%. IR (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3425bs, 1641vs, 1578vs, 1466m, 1397s, 1328w, 1245w, 1094m, 1047m, 979w, 781m, 693m, 587w, 514w.</ce:para><ce:section-title>{[Zn(TBTA)(3-bpo)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>](H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>}<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>3</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">The same synthetic method as that for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> was used except that H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>BTA was replaced by H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>TBTA (48.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), giving colorless block crystals of <ce:bold>3</ce:bold> after ca. 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>week in 70% yield (37.3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, based on 3-bpo). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">32</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>ZnN<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>Br<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>: C, 36.07; H, 2.27; N, 10.52. Found: C, 36.20; H, 1.99; N, 10.26%. IR (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3352bs, 1582vs, 1470m, 1400s, 1320s, 1196w, 1082m, 1031m, 966w, 870w, 802m, 732m, 696s, 624m, 565m, 525w.</ce:para><ce:section-title>{[Cd(TBTA)(3-bpo)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>](H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>}<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>4</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">The same synthetic method as that for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> was used except that H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>BTA and Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O were replaced by H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>TBTA (48.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and Cd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (30.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), respectively. Colorless block crystals of <ce:bold>4</ce:bold> were obtained after ca. 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>week in 62% yield (34.5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, based on 3-bpo). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">32</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>CdN<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>Br<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>: C, 34.54; H, 2.17; N, 10.07. Found: C, 34.19; H, 2.35; N, 10.24%. IR (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3421bs, 1707m, 1596vs, 1462w, 1403m, 1318s, 1241m, 1055s, 782w, 694s, 641w, 561w.</ce:para><ce:section-title>{[Co(TBTA)(3-bpo)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>](H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>}<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>5</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">The same synthetic method as that for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> was used except that H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>BTA and Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O were replaced by H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>TBTA (48.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and Co(OAc)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (25.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), respectively. Red block crystals of <ce:bold>5</ce:bold> were obtained after ca. 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>week in 66% yield (35.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, based on 3-bpo). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">32</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>CoN<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>Br<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>: C, 36.29; H, 2.28; N, 10.58. Found: C, 35.92; H, 1.98; N, 10.26%. IR (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3359bs, 1578vs, 1471m, 1402s, 1320s, 1195w, 1082m, 1031m, 967w, 877w, 801m, 696s, 628w, 566m.</ce:para><ce:section-title>[Pb(TBTA)(3-bph)]<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>6</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">The same synthetic method as that for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> was used except that H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>BTA and Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O were replaced by H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>TBTA (48.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and Pb(OAc)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·3H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (38.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), respectively. Colorless block crystals of <ce:bold>6</ce:bold> were obtained after ca. 2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>weeks in 44% yield (40.9<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">20</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>PbN<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>Br<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>: C, 25.85; H, 1.08; N, 6.03. Found: C, 25.61; H, 1.19; N, 5.87%. IR (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3435b, 3082m, 1708m, 1608s, 1378vs, 1316vs, 1242m, 1056m, 832w, 785w, 691m, 567w.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of complexes 1-6 

[Zn(HBTA)2(3-bpo)2](H2O) (1)

A mixture of H2BTA (24.5mg, 0.1mmol) and 3-bpo (22.4mg, 0.1mmol) was dissolved in DMF/H2O (10mL, v/v =1/1) under stirring, which was placed at the bottom of a straight glass tube. Then, a CH3OH solution (10mL) of Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (29.7mg, 0.1mmol) was carefully layered onto it. Upon evaporation of the solvents, colorless block crystals of 1 suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained after ca. 1week in 51% yield (26.0mg, based on H2BTA). Anal. Calc. for C40H26ZnN8O11Br2: C, 47.11; H, 2.57; N, 10.99. Found: C, 46.89; H, 2.71; N, 11.12%. IR (cm-1): 3495bs, 1716m, 1623vs, 1549w, 1468m, 1366s, 1296s, 1239s, 1092m, 1044s, 813m, 772w, 726w, 688w, 648w, 536m.

[Cd(HBTA)2(3-bpo)2(H2O)2](H2O)3 (2)

The same synthetic method as that for 1 was used except that Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O was replaced by Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (30.8mg, 0.1mmol), producing colorless block crystals of 2 after ca. 1week in 50% yield (28.5mg, based on H2BTA). Anal. Calc. for C40H34CdN8O15Br2: C, 42.18; H, 3.01; N, 9.84. Found: C, 41.89; H, 3.34; N, 10.01%. IR (cm-1): 3425bs, 1641vs, 1578vs, 1466m, 1397s, 1328w, 1245w, 1094m, 1047m, 979w, 781m, 693m, 587w, 514w.

{[Zn(TBTA)(3-bpo)2(H2O)2](H2O)2} n  (3)

The same synthetic method as that for 1 was used except that H2BTA was replaced by H2TBTA (48.2mg, 0.1mmol), giving colorless block crystals of 3 after ca. 1week in 70% yield (37.3mg, based on 3-bpo). Anal. Calc. for C32H24ZnN8O10Br4: C, 36.07; H, 2.27; N, 10.52. Found: C, 36.20; H, 1.99; N, 10.26%. IR (cm-1): 3352bs, 1582vs, 1470m, 1400s, 1320s, 1196w, 1082m, 1031m, 966w, 870w, 802m, 732m, 696s, 624m, 565m, 525w.

{[Cd(TBTA)(3-bpo)2(H2O)2](H2O)2} n  (4)

The same synthetic method as that for 1 was used except that H2BTA and Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O were replaced by H2TBTA (48.2mg, 0.1mmol) and Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (30.8mg, 0.1mmol), respectively. Colorless block crystals of 4 were obtained after ca. 1week in 62% yield (34.5mg, based on 3-bpo). Anal. Calc. for C32H24CdN8O10Br4: C, 34.54; H, 2.17; N, 10.07. Found: C, 34.19; H, 2.35; N, 10.24%. IR (cm-1): 3421bs, 1707m, 1596vs, 1462w, 1403m, 1318s, 1241m, 1055s, 782w, 694s, 641w, 561w.

{[Co(TBTA)(3-bpo)2(H2O)2](H2O)2} n  (5)

The same synthetic method as that for 1 was used except that H2BTA and Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O were replaced by H2TBTA (48.2mg, 0.1mmol) and Co(OAc)2⋅4H2O (25.0mg, 0.1mmol), respectively. Red block crystals of 5 were obtained after ca. 1week in 66% yield (35.0mg, based on 3-bpo). Anal. Calc. for C32H24CoN8O10Br4: C, 36.29; H, 2.28; N, 10.58. Found: C, 35.92; H, 1.98; N, 10.26%. IR (cm-1): 3359bs, 1578vs, 1471m, 1402s, 1320s, 1195w, 1082m, 1031m, 967w, 877w, 801m, 696s, 628w, 566m.

[Pb(TBTA)(3-bph)] n  (6)

The same synthetic method as that for 1 was used except that H2BTA and Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O were replaced by H2TBTA (48.2mg, 0.1mmol) and Pb(OAc)2⋅3H2O (38.0mg, 0.1mmol), respectively. Colorless block crystals of 6 were obtained after ca. 2weeks in 44% yield (40.9mg). Anal. Calc. for C20H10PbN4O6Br4: C, 25.85; H, 1.08; N, 6.03. Found: C, 25.61; H, 1.19; N, 5.87%. IR (cm-1): 3435b, 3082m, 1708m, 1608s, 1378vs, 1316vs, 1242m, 1056m, 832w, 785w, 691m, 567w.
